description: Externalized assistant knowledge base for help content, site navigation, and intent-specific guidance

greeting.description: User is greeting the assistant or initiating conversation

product_search.description: User wants to find specific products matching criteria
examples: i want to buy a shirt

category_browse.description: User wants to browse products by category

pricing.description: User interested in price, budget, or value-oriented search

recommendation.description: User wants personalized suggestions or recommendations

site_help.description: User needs help navigating the site or understanding features

orders.shortAnswer: View your order history in the Orders page at /orders.
orders.detailedAnswer: You can view all past orders with order details, shipping information, and payment breakdown on the Orders page. Each order shows status, items purchased, and total cost.

cart.shortAnswer: Access your cart at /cart to review items before checkout.
cart.detailedAnswer: The cart page shows all items you've added, with quantity controls and price totals. From the cart you can proceed to checkout or continue shopping.

checkout.shortAnswer: Complete your purchase on the Checkout page at /checkout.
checkout.detailedAnswer: The checkout flow collects shipping and payment information. You can review your order summary before finalizing the purchase.

favorites.shortAnswer: Save products to your Favorites page for easy access later.
favorites.detailedAnswer: Use the heart icon on product cards or detail pages to save items. View all saved items on the Favorites page at /favorites.

tickets.shortAnswer: The Tickets page can generate implementation tickets and now includes analytics/history.
tickets.detailedAnswer: The ticket generator creates structured GitHub-style implementation tickets based on your requirements. Access it at /tickets to generate tickets, view history, and see analytics.

auth.shortAnswer: Use Sign In from the header menu or /auth/signin to access personalized recommendations, profile, orders, and role-based dev features.
auth.detailedAnswer: Authentication enables personalized experiences including order history, saved favorites, profile management, and role-based access to developer features.

profile.shortAnswer: Manage your account on the Profile page at /profile.
profile.detailedAnswer: View and edit your profile information, preferences, and account settings.

devMode.shortAnswer: Dev mode and roles are managed on the /dev/testing page.
devMode.detailedAnswer: Developer mode provides role-based access testing, session management controls, and QA workflows. Access the testing dashboard at /dev/testing to switch roles, manage tokens, and test different user experiences.

general.shortAnswer: I can help with products, orders, cart/checkout, favorites, tickets, sign-in/profile, roles/dev mode, token/session behavior, and testing workflows.
general.detailedAnswer: I'm your shopping assistant for this e-commerce site. I can help you discover products, compare prices, navigate features, and answer questions about orders, favorites, checkout, ticket generation, authentication, and testing workflows.
